title: The Killing of Freddie Gray – Episode 15 – The Trials: Diminishing Returns
description:
June 19, 2017 / The trials of the “Baltimore 6” were set up to be historic, on the scales of the OJ Simpson trial. In court, the cases fell flat. We examine why.

Episode scoring music by AnimalWeapon, Blue Dot Sessions, Chris Zabriskie, Fleslit, H-LR, Jahzzar, Remain, Uncanny Valleys, VYVCH, and Sym5.

Support for Undisclosed comes from our friends at Rocket Mortgage by Quicken Loans. Find the right mortgage for you by going to RocketMortgage.com/Undisclosed.

Also, check out this week’s Blue Apron menu and get your first 3 meals FREE by going to BlueApron.com/Undisclosed.

#undisclosed  #freddiegray #justiceforfreddie
